document.discussion_title: Group that aids adults in transition hosts fundraising raffle
document.topic_text: Group that aids adults in transition hosts fundraising raffle Published: Thursday, Aug. 11, 2016 9:00 p.m. CDT By KANE COUNTY CHRONICLE - editorial@kcchronicle.com GENEVA – Cynthia K. Wade’s do-over.me, a non-profit organization that provides support for adults in transition, is selling 100 raffle tickets at $25 each to win a two-hour sail aboard the 34-foot Halcyon on Lake Michigan for four adults. Tickets are available by visiting www.do-over.me . The drawing will be held Aug. 31. The Halcyon features a radio with an iPod connector, on which patrons can play music of their choice; an on-board head; small kitchen; personal flotation devices; and a marine VHF radio system. The sailing event will be scheduled at the winner’s convenience, weather permitting, day or evening, weekday or weekend. A picnic basket of provisions will be provided, including either beer or wine, as requested. For more information, call 630-402-0429 or email Cynthia@do-over.me
